The university law programme provides a sound theoretical foundation for a career in law. But how does a law firm really work in practice?

We often meet law students who are unsure what they want to do after graduating and, for many of our employees, it was just the same. We know the choice can be a difficult one, so we offer various opportunities for law students to see beyond the classroom and gain a better idea of what business law and Mannheimer Swartling are all about.

Whatever your thoughts about the future, we are keen to get to know you. In particular, we would like to give you the opportunity to discover – possibly unexpected – dimensions of business law that are not normally apparent when studying law at university. Use the menu to find out more about what we can offer you as a law student. We look forward to meeting you!
